originalText.text:
A 4+ years hair journey led me to a momentous decisionâ€”cutting and donating my long hair! Enter Sara, my incredible barber and stylist, who turned this transition into an absolute delight!

Sara didn't just cut my hair; she transformed it into something even better than I could've imagined. Her attention to detail and ability to capture exactly what I wanted truly blew me away. The result? A style that not only suited me but took it up a notch.

What sets Sara apart is not just her talent but also the care she puts into her work. She welcomed me with warmth and turned a potentially nerve-wracking experience into a fun and relaxed one.

I can't thank Sara enough for not just a fantastic haircut but for making the whole experience so special. If you're thinking of a change, go see Sara!!! 5 stars don't do justice!! Thanks a million, Sara!!!! ðŸŒŸ

1000000% would recommend!!!

originalText.text: Iâ€™ve never left a hair salon 100% happy since living in NYC until coming here. I canâ€™t say enough good things about this place and David! He delivers EXACTLY what I want EVERY time, if not better. He asks ALL the questions to make sure he sees your vision and then works his magic. Everyone that works here is friendly, passionate and professional. They use the best products (Davines!) and the prices are so reasonable. The quality of service is top tier.

originalText.text: Let me just say that David did an amazing job! He understood exactly what I wanted and delivered it precisely. I felt so beautiful after my haircut and blowout. I couldnâ€™t be happier with the results and Iâ€™m so glad I found my new hair stylist.

text.text: Let me just say that David did an amazing job! He understood exactly what I wanted and delivered it precisely. I felt so beautiful after my haircut and blowout. I couldnâ€™t be happier with the results and Iâ€™m so glad I found my new hair stylist.

originalText.text:
When I first booked with Wilde and Co, I was lucky enough that the system booked me with David and I have been going back to him ever since.

I have gotten several hair cuts and soon to be 2 colorings here with David and I have never been happier with any other stylist in all my life.

I have very fine straight ashy blonde hair naturally, and went platinum with David. My hair was not damaged at all, and the coloring has lasted months with proper care at home.

My cuts I get with him grow out nicely as well.

Very very happy with David over the years and I will be going back to him for my cuts and colorings for years to come.

A close friend of mine has been going to Andrew for years as well. So really, you cannot go wrong with Wilde and Co.
